body_html:
I'm working on project to do federate machine learning as a service. It does both inference and training through a Go client library. These changes are part of what's needed in order to be able to quantize models on the fly to improve inference performance. I have an attributes PR in the works as well which should make it possible to fully inspect and manipulate the models.

Go client library: https://github.com/luk-ai/lukai

Site: https://luk.ai

I'm working on project to do federate machine learning as a service. It does both inference and training through a Go client library. These changes are part of what's needed in order to be able to quantize models on the fly to improve inference performance. I have an attributes PR in the works as well which should make it possible to fully inspect and manipulate the models.
